title: Visual update - Login screen re-release for Nocturne
body:
Nocturne is looking old and dodgy, kinda needs a nice coat of paint. However, since he only got one recently (in the last two years or so) maybe its just time to release the old login screen, with a new music piece.

Thresh has arguably one of the coolest login themes to date (slightly biased, i do love thresh), if riot could pull of something equally as haunting for the Nightmare, that would be excellent, especially with harrowing coming up soon.
